title: Personal Website v2
summary: Second version of my personal website, built to showcase work, projects and hobbies.
details: Integrated Shadcn UI components for styling.

title: Building Permits X-Ray: Cambridge, MA
summary: Data Analysis Final Project. Analyzed building permits data to identify trends and patterns in construction activity. Final project done as part of a data analytics bootcamp.
details: Used Python, Jupyter Notebook and Pandas, for data analysis.
Used Matplotlib and Seaborn for data visualization.

title: Book Recommendation System
summary: A book recommendation system that uses unsupervised learning to recommend books to users based on book ratings and publication year.
details: Cleaned and prepared data using Python, Jupyter Notebook and Pandas.
Created a recommendation system using Scikit-learn for unsupervised learning.
Developed a Streamlit app to showcase the recommendation system.
